articles.title: Australia's most successful Winter Olympics coach Peter McNiel and how his moguls team led the Milano Cortina gold rush
articles.description: With a background in mathematics and an enviable attention to detail, it would be tempting to think of Australian ski coach Peter McNiel as moguls' answer to Moneyball. The truth is far more detailed.
articles.content:
Australian moguls coach Peter McNiel had reached a crossroads.
A mathematics and statistics graduate from the University of Melbourne, McNiel was coaching moguls part time.
A more stable career in financial services was waiting.
"We were funded well ... [11688 chars]

articles.title: Spurs signing veteran center Mason Plumlee to 10-day deal
articles.description: Free agent center Mason Plumlee is signing a 10-day contract with the San Antonio Spurs.
articles.content:
Free agent center Mason Plumlee is signing a 10-day contract with the San Antonio Spurs, his representative Mark Bartelstein of Priority Sports told ESPN's Shams Charania on Tuesday.
Plumlee, in his 13th NBA season, was traded by the Hornets to the T... [345 chars]

articles.title: Vinicius Junior: Jose Mourinho's 'big mistake' after 'disgusting' incident
articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold calls the alleged racist abuse of team-mate Vinicius Junior a "disgrace to football", while opposition manager Jose Mourinho is criticised for his comments.
articles.content: Trent Alexander-Arnold said the alleged racist abuse of team-mate Vinicius Junior during Real Madrid's Champions League match at Benfica was a "disgrace to football", while opposition manager Jose Mourinho was criticised for his comments on the incid... [4058 chars]

articles.title: Dashing young Roo has surgery on broken finger
articles.description: Young Roo Colby McKercher has had surgery after suffering a finger injury
articles.content:
YOUNG North Melbourne star Colby McKercher has had surgery on his left hand, but the Roos are confident he will be fit to play Port Adelaide in round one.
AFL.com.au's Cal Twomey is reporting the Tasmanian had a cracked finger and went under the knif... [839 chars]

articles.title: Real Madrid star Vinícius Júnior says Benfica's Gianluca Prestianni racially abused him in Champions League match
articles.description: Real Madrid forward Vinícius Júnior accuses an opponent of racially abusing him during a Champions League game against Benfica, leading to the game being halted for nearly 10 minutes.
articles.content:
A Champions League game has been halted for almost 10 minutes after Real Madrid forward Vinícius Júnior accused a Benfica player of racially abusing him.
Madrid defender Trent Alexander-Arnold called the incident "a disgrace to football", while Benfi... [4187 chars]

articles.title: Victims in Rhode Island hockey arena shooting were suspect's ex-wife and son
articles.description: A person who  opened fire during a youth hockey game  at an ice rink in Rhode Island on Monday killed their ex-wife and one son, Pawtucket Police Chief Tina Goncalves said Tuesday.
articles.content:
A person who opened fire during a youth hockey game at an ice rink in Rhode Island on Monday was specifically targeting family members, and killed their ex-wife and one son, Pawtucket Police Chief Tina Goncalves said Tuesday.
Goncalves said the victi... [3726 chars]

articles.title: Day 12: What to watch with Team Canada at Milano Cortina 2026
articles.description: There are finals in men’s and women’s snowboard slopestyle, short track speed skating & a quarterfinal game for Team Canada in men’s hockey.
articles.content:
After heavy snow postponed a couple of events on Tuesday, get set for a jam-packed day of competition on Wednesday at Milano Cortina 2026.
There are finals in men’s and women’s snowboard slopestyle, a chance to add to the medal tally in short track s... [3028 chars]

articles.title: Bradford City once again justify their place at the top table
articles.description: City 1 Stockport 0 - The Bantams showed guts and grit at Valley Parade, with Sarcevic sealing a hard-fought win
articles.content:
Written by Jason McKeown (images by John Dewhirst)
The bravery coursing through Bradford City is what stands out the most. After the bruising run of four defeats in five, there was every reason to fear a timid slide into mediocrity. But here, just as... [6705 chars]

articles.title: Patriots make expected move for new defensive coordinator
articles.description: Source confirms Patriots officially promoting Zak Kuhr to defensive coordinator.
articles.content:
The Patriots are officially promoting Zak Kuhr to defensive coordinator, a source confirms.
Following Terrell Williams being moved to a “high-ranking role” on Mike Vrabel’s staff from his DC job, the Kuhr move was expected.
Kuhr impressed as the team... [996 chars]
